original_title: 犯された女交渉人 香西咲
overview: Two robbers assault a bank place, but things go south quickly. They get trapped inside and they get forced to take hostages. They are demanding a huge ransom and a safe escape to liberate the hostages harmlessly.  Saki Kozai is a policewoman in charge of the negotitations, a very beautiful but capable professional who has experience negotiating hostage situations. She doesn’t hesitate a second to put herself on the line and enter the place when the tensions are the highest, to negotiate face to face.  What Saki didn’t expect is that she has a personal connection and past with one of the robbers, triggering a series of emotions that render the situation out of control.
title: Female Hostage Negotiator Rape Victim Saki Kozai
